description: Resubmitting the version made by Illuminator because that's how Wolf Hoffmann played it, check out Wolf's Guitar Lair.
title: Fast As A Shark

description:
Changed Main-Riff, Pre-Chorus, Chorus, Verse, Bridge and Tempo. Wolf plays in the Main Riff the muted e-string too, and in the Chorus the main melodie. In the Pre-Chorus and the Bridge he plays the Chords diffrently. You can see it here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7PET3XcQIEg

and
